Title: S19:E3 - Why Python is still one of the most popular coding languages (Meredydd Luff)
Description: In this episode, we talk about Python with Meredydd Luff, founder of Anvil. Meredydd talks about why python continues to be one of the most popular coding languages, what the language is best at, and about the tool he created to help developers build full stack web apps with just Python.
